data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
David Coote awards Tottenham a goal kick.
In the minute 1, David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
David Coote signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 4, Tottenham drive forward but Heung Min Son is judged offside.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) has received a yellow card from David Coote.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Tottenham at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in Tottenham.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Tottenham.
Southampton pushes forward through Che Adams, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Southampton.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 12, Heung Min Son for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 14, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Free kick Tottenham.
David Coote signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Important block from the Tottenham defence as Che Adams fires in a strike for Southampton.
In Southampton, Che Adams of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Southampton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 24, David Coote signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Tottenham's area.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Southampton's Moussa Djenepo fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 26, Tottenham have a goal kick.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tottenham's Lucas Moura has run offside.
In the minute 27, David Coote signals a Tottenham throw-in in Southampton's half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Moussa Djenepo (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Tottenham at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in Southampton.
Goal! Southampton have got their heads in front thanks to a Danny Ings strike.
In the minute 32, That's a fine assist from Kyle Walker-Peters.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 35, Harry Kane for Tottenham is whistled offside.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Tottenham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Southampton's Che Adams has been booked in Southampton.
In the minute 40, Free kick Southampton.
Throw-in for Tottenham at St. Mary's Stadium.
David Coote signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Free kick Tottenham.
In the minute 44, James Ward-Prowse is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
At St. Mary's Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
The first half has been concluded at St. Mary's Stadium.
Tanguy Ndombele for Tottenham has been booked by David Coote and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Heung Min Son levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 45, Great play from Harry Kane to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Giovani Lo Celso is replacing Tanguy Ndombele for Tottenham at St. Mary's Stadium.
Che Adams for Southampton drives towards goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Tottenham take a 1-2 lead thanks to Heung Min Son.
Harry Kane with an assist there.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 49, Stuart Armstrong of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Heung Min Son of Tottenham is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 51, Southampton drives forward and James Ward-Prowse gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
David Coote signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 54, Tottenham's Harry Kane gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in Southampton.
William Smallbone is replacing Oriol Romeu for the home team.
Danny Ings of Southampton is pulled up for offside.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, David Coote signals a Tottenham throw-in in Southampton's half.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In Southampton Southampton's Moussa Djenepo is caught offside.
In the minute 59, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Tottenham.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
The away team have replaced Lucas Moura with Erik Lamela. This is the second substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
In Southampton Southampton attack through Che Adams. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, David Coote awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Goal! Tottenham extend their lead to 1-3 through Heung Min Son.
That's a fine assist from Harry Kane.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Tottenham at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in for Tottenham at St. Mary's Stadium.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
At St. Mary's Stadium, Jack Stephens has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Southampton make their second substitution with Nathan Tella replacing Stuart Armstrong.
In the minute 71, Nathan Tella for Southampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
Tottenham's Heung Min Son has run offside.
In the minute 72, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Goal! Heung Min Son extends Tottenham's lead to 1-4.
Harry Kane with an assist there.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Tottenham.
Erik Lamela (Tottenham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Matt Doherty (Tottenham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Shane Long is on a sub for Che Adams for Southampton.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 82, Erik Lamela gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tottenham.
Great finish from Harry Kane to give Tottenham a 1-5 lead.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 83, Southampton's Shane Long attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
The away team replace Harry Kane with Steven Bergwijn.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Tottenham.
James Ward-Prowse of Southampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Southampton have been awarded a penalty...
David Coote will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton just outside Tottenham's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Tottenham drive upfield and Giovani Lo Celso gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Southampton defender.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
It's 2-5 at the end of normal time.
Southampton are back in the match in Southampton. A Danny Ings penalty has made the score 2-5.
Giovani Lo Celso (Tottenham) gets a yellow card.
